setting.name: interDigitTimeout
setting.label: Inter-DTMF Timeout
setting.description: Time to wait between each dialpad key before interpretting user's request. Cannot be greater than Overall DTMF Timeout

setting.name: overallDigitTimeout
setting.label: Overall DTMF Timeout
setting.description: Total time to wait before interpretting user's request.

setting.name: maxDigits
setting.label: Maximum Number of DTMF tones
setting.description: Maximum number of dialpad keys to accept before interpretting user's request.

setting.name: noinputCount
setting.label: Replay Count
setting.description: Number of times auto attendant would repeat the prompt after the initial announcement due to no input received from user before giving up and transferring the call or disconnecting.

setting.name: nomatchCount
setting.label: Invalid Response Count
setting.description: Number of times user can input an invalid response before transferring the call or disconnecting

setting.name: transfer
setting.label: Transfer on Failures
setting.description: If enabled, auto attendant will transfer the call to a designated extension if no valid response is received. If disabled, the call will be disconnected.

setting.name: transfer-extension
setting.label: Transfer Extension
setting.description: Extension to be used when transfer on failure is enabled.

setting.name: transfer-prompt
setting.label: Prompt to play when transferring call after failure
